title: New York -- before the City
description: 400 years after Hudson found New York harbor, Eric Sanderson shares how he made a 3D map of Mannahatta's fascinating pre-city ecology of hills, rivers, wildlife -- accurate down to the block -- when Times Square was a wetland and you couldn't get delivery.
author: Eric Sanderson
keywords: TED, talks, cities, environment, history, life, nature, sustainability, technology, visualizations
